debug package¶

Submodules¶

debug.debug_klang module¶

debug.debug_klang.generate_klang_graph(node, data)¶

Generates a graph output of the Klang algorithm, in .json format. :param node: The term for which the relations are to be visualized. :param data: The Klang output data. :return: A graph of the keyword showing its relations found by the Klang algorithm, in .json format.
